name: phalaenopsis
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a kind of orchid (= a plant with beautifully coloured flowers that have an unusual shape): The phalaenopsis is a popular plant to give as a present. It is important not to give a phalaenopsis too much water.
More examplesFewer examplesMake sure that you to cut back the phalaenopsis before the last of its flowers drops.I have tried to grow phalaenopsis in the house, but they never seem to bloom.She had filled her tiny workshop with single-stemmed phalaenopsis.
